Title: St. Vincent
Overview: A young boy whose parents just divorced finds an unlikely friend and mentor in the misanthropic, bawdy, hedonistic, war veteran who lives next door.
production_companies: The Weinstein Company, Crescendo Productions, Chernin Entertainment, Goldenlight Films
Cast: Bill Murray, Melissa McCarthy, Naomi Watts
